name: See You Later
description:
"It's actually a dull place, even the best food is, well, just creamy ginger over rice from a local chain brand storefront. But despite that, it's true that the place where I have the most memories with her is also my favourite place."

On lifespan theory, returning swallows, and saying goodbye to her

"The hard part is never how to say it, but how to get her to accept it."
"But she'll accept it in the end, even if it will come across like I'm bullying her, she'll still accept it."
"Just like I accepted that I would only live less than six months."

Feature
A slightly bitter confession
Warm and mellow memories
Evocative dreams
And a final, well-spoken goodbye.

What to see in the game

More than thirty beautiful illustrations
Expression-rich character drawings
Full character dubbing support
CG Appreciation Mode available
Rich performance

Introduction to the main characters






QQ 953202123
